original_title: Los Fabulosos Cadillacs: La luz del ritmo
overview: It tells of the band's record return with "La luz del ritmo", reflecting in a very intimate way the process of creation and recording. Linking the documentary images, it includes interviews conducted by Marcelo Fernández Bitar, where the protagonists present the album song by song.
title: Los Fabulosos Cadillacs: La luz del ritmo
